runs.comm: back of a length and outside off, Devcich attempts a slap but mistimes to mid-off
presents a straighter bat this time while defending a fuller delivery on off stump
nicely done there, waits on a shortish ball and runs it off the open face to third man to get himself and the team off the mark
tests him with a fuller delivery a shade outside off, but there isn't any movement though. Williamson is forward and pushes to mid-off
pushes him back this time with a shortish ball on off stump. Williamson stays in line and punches to the right of short cover
unveils a checked drive to mid-off after stepping forward to a fuller ball outside off. Wonderfully controlled from Williamson
shuffles back and across against a shortish ball that cuts back in at him and works towards mid-on
teases the drive out of Devcich with a full and wide delivery. Can't pierce the field in the covers
strays a touch straight and he clips to deep square leg. Solid wristwork from Devcich, and he almost ran into the bowler while picking up a single
gets off the mark with a back-foot clip through midwicket
fine leg was up and Devcich was looking to take advantage. Gingerly got down on one knee and tried to guide the ball past Gul, but he picks him out
lands a slower yorker on off stump and Devcich digs it out to point
crisply struck as he stays balanced on his back foot and used the full face of the bat to hit a shortish ball to cover
beats the off-side ring with a little assistance from his feet. Charges at the bowler, affords himself a little room and drills the ball through the gap
length ball, picked up and launched over deep fine leg. Only the crowd needs to worry about that. How quickly did he get into position - got inside the line and swung it away
gets in line with the stumps and manages an inside edge to a good length ball on middle. Single taken as it wanders away towards point
Shehzad dives, and shakes his forefiner and his head at the batsman, as if saying don't think about running. The slice was quite powerful from Devcich, but it wasn't far enough away from point's left
another slower ball, Devcich didn't seem to have picked it. Premeditated a lap sweep and has missed it altogether
runs at the bowler and aims a slash through the covers, but he was looking to hit the ball too hard. Cannot time it, not can he hit the gap
a shimmy down the pitch towards a fuller ball and drives to Shehzad at point, who makes sure Devcich is on his toes at the bowler's end
on the pads, and a touch short which allows Williamson to shift his balance back and pull to deep square leg

dupes him with a slower bouncer. Beautiful bowling from Tanvir with the batsman itching to run at him. Forces Devcich to think on his feet, and despite him trying to follow the ball and try and upper cut, he misses
change of pace again, Devcich loads up to slam it over the leg side, but has to settle for a scoop over the covers. Terrific running fetches New Zealand three.
lines up a slower bouncer and pulls it down to deep square leg. Conscious roll of the wrists there from Williamson
flat-batted to the long-on bounday! Brutal hit from Devcich as he allowed a shortish ball to come on to him before unleashing a full-blodded swing. Perfectly agricultural
what a shot! Nimble footwork to get himself closer to the length ball which has been lifted quite serenly to the long-off boundary
shortish and a shade outside off, Williamson looks to drag it to midwicket and mistimes it
charges down and realises the bowler has opted to go slower. He's already made room for himself, which means he just had to wait a second more and then slap it through the covers
sends down a bouncer right over off stump, Williamson looks for a pull but this has too much heat for him. Whistles over his shoulder
made a little too much room there as he ran at Gul, who beats him with a back of a length ball outside off
shuffles across outside off and drives a fuller delivery down to mid-on

top shot, made by quick and precise footwork. He saw the ball short and though it was cramping him on middle and off, Devcich moves away and slices it through point. Beautiful hands through the ball as well
wanders outside off and looks to sweep and beat the lone man at short fine leg, isn't quite so successful
goes on with the angle and gets a touch more bounce than Williamson thought. Beaten on the defence and is struck on the thighs
goes back and tries to drill a shortish delivery through cover, but has played too early. Gets an inside edge to mid-on
backs away and slashes at a fuller delivery angled in on leg stump and beats short third man. Very intentional
fuller delivery outside off, Devicich was looking to slap it through the off side as well. Only gets an inside edge
comes down the track and clips a fuller delivery towards the vacant midwicket region
he has found his timing tonight, comes down to the pitch of the ball and lifts Hafeez over midwicket. Couple collected
pushed down to long-on after nipping down the pitch again. Hafeez tries flattening his trajectory, but can't keep him quiet
sneaks in an arm ball on middle and leg and the advancing Devcich had not picked it. Gets an inside edge to midwicket
good length ball, which he turns shortish by moving back and clipping to deep midwicket

timberrr! It's a quicker delivery, with barely any spin. Devicich was hoping for some as he backed away and went for a cut through the covers. The ball though skids on and strikes middle. Hafeez and left-handers, the story continues
uses his wrists to tuck a shortish delivery through the vacant midwicket region
takes it off off stump to try and slice towards point, can't find the middle

got him, says the star man! It was pushed through fuller on middle and leg and Brownlie was stuck in the crease while trying to play around it. There was a hint of doubt about the ball heading down leg, but the batsman did not help himself with his choice of shot
quicker and fuller on middle, Taylor pushes to long-on
flighted outside off, Williamson almost yorks himself as he lunges forward to drive into the covers
flatter on middle, Williamson clips it to deep midwicket
fired in on leg stump, Williamson works it through to deep midwicket
tossed up on middle, Taylor sweeps to deep fine leg to take refuge at the other end
gorgeous chip from Williamson as he ventures down the pitch and lifts a flighted delivery towards long-off
cramps him up on middle and Taylor seems to be stuck between defending and flicking through midwicket
dropped, but it was a difficult chance for the keeper. Thick edge as Hasan lures Taylor to push at the ball away from his body. Sarfraz gets a glove on it, but can't get it to stick
flighted on off stump, pushed down to mid-off
comes down the track and looks to close the face a touch too soon. Afridi's leggies get a bit of purchase but Shehzad at point is impregnable
shortish and outside off, Williamson cuts to short third man
slants a quicker and flatter delivery way down the leg side. Dew already? Afridi lifts his hand in apology to his keeper, who did really well moving miles to his left
he's beaten by the slow nature of this pitch. Williamson had strode down the pitch and was going through with a loft when the length was not yet on him. Chips it over the bowler, lucky.
fuller ball on middle, kept out
tossed up outside off and Taylor laces it through the covers

through him, star man shines! Williamson has been very adept in picking his shots and which foot to play off of. But this time he is stuck in the crease and is beaten for pace as Afridi skittles through his defences
back of a length on off stump, Taylor nudges into the covers and runs
back of a length and outside off, Latham keeps to his crease and pushes towards mid-off
tries to run a shortish ball behind point, but he finds Shehzad
picks the gap behind point as he waits on a short ball outside off and runs it down with an open face
punched through the covers as he stands up tall behind a short delivery on and around off stump

splices a pull to deep square leg, but the ball lands well short of the fielder rushing in. Latham tried to shift his balance back to try and pull a back of a length delivery, but it reached him too quickly
gets down the track to nudge a flighted delivery on middle through to long-on
nips down to a length ball on middle and tucks it to deep midwicket
stays back to a good length ball, waits on it to turn and then clips it to deep midwicket
well flighted on middle, but Latham takes advantage of it as he lunges forward and sweeps it confidently to the square leg boundary
opens the face after he meets the pitch of the ball and slices it through point
drags his length short and Latham has rocked back and pulled to the midwicket boundary. Surprising amount of power to his strokes
struck on the pads Pakistan think as he was looking to a scoop, but I think he got glove on it. Actually, all it hit was the glove
flighted on leg stump, Latham goes for a delicate lap sweep. Finds short fine leg
gets down on one knee to a length ball and sweeps it strongly to deep square leg
just a shade short and Taylor was back and waiting for it. He's quite prolific on the cut, but this time he's missed it
sweep goes wrong and Hasan is overjoyed as he traps Taylor in front! It was fuller and quicker on middle, the batsman sought to hit across the line and pays for his mistake
flighted on off stump, defended
short and wide, and going further away. Latham cannot reach with his cut shot and the umpire says that's the bowler's fault
pushed through outside off again and Latham misses out on a cut again
takes it on the full and sweeps to short fine leg. Was that the offspinner though?
lovely use of the bottom hand as he rocks back and flicks a shortish delivery to deep midwicket
too short again and Latham has jumped back for a pull to deep midwicket
flighted on off stump, Ronchi ensures his pad doesn't get in the way and blocks
slid down the leg side and Ronchi tries to sweep. Can't get there and it's the second wide of the over

amazing timing from Ronchi as he leans forward to a fuller ball outside off and lifts it over cover. Seemed a mere extension of defence, but it sailed through the air towards long-off who was racing to his left
good length ball on middle, Latham sinks to one knee and sweeps to deep fine leg
pushed through fuller on off stump, Ronchi is stuck in the crease but his hands make up as he pushes into the covers
nudged through to deep midwicket as Raza strays on the pads while bowling over the wicket
another sweep, this one was brought about through good placement than power. Waited on it and rolled his wrists to beat deep fine leg
stays back in his crease to slice a good length ball from off stump to deep point
fired in outside off, Ronchi slices towards point and sneaks a single
quick to move back against a short ball outside off and pulls to deep midwicket
gets a little grip and turn from way outside leg stump, Ronchi looks for a sweep but can't reach it. Sarfraz was too far down leg to compensate for the late turn and he is beaten on his left
flighted outside off and driven into the covers
smoked over long-off! Ronchi planted his front leg to the pitch and lifted the ball over the bowler's head. He got to opportunity to free those arms, and boy did he pounce
two in two! This one clattering into the crowd behind long-on! Gets under another fuller delivery on middle, and that giant front foot stride helps Ronchi unfurl a full swing of his arms
looks for a third as Afridi flights it outside off. It's a touch slower than the rest and that means Ronchi was into the shot too early. Mistimes it to long-on
drilled down to long-off, and Shehzad pulls off a brilliant save. Think he was searching for the yorker, but it ended up an overpitched delivery that Ronchi's bottom hand loved.
backs away to a length ball, but is cramped by Gul following him. Manages to nudge towards midwicket
fuller delivery on leg stump, Latham blocks into the off side

runs down and tries to belt a full and wide delivery over mid-off, but holes out to the man. Gul, returning from injury, is among the wickets as well. Got it off the bottom of the bat and there was no power into the shot
banged in on middle and leg because Ronchi was moving down leg. Tries to upper cut it, but he can't connect
fuller and a shade outside off, slapped down to long-off
fuller delivery outside off is scythed through the covers. Neesh pushes his partner for a second and the fielder from the deep does not have enough heat on the throw. Nasim was the man
good length ball on middle, pushed to long-on
good length ball on off stump, Neesh tucks it through midwicket
fires in a yorker on middle and Ronchi does extremely well to work it into the vacant midwicket region and snatch a couple of runs before the fielder in the deep can catch up

skews away to the fine leg boundary as Ronchi benefits from an inside edge. Tanvir has bowled two pretty good deliveries and they have cost him six runs. This one was cutting Ronchi's hopes of making room for himself, but the batsman went through with a drill through the off side and gets lucky

this should put a smile on Tanvir's face. He's forced a false shot from Ronchi, who has a short ball rise on him and take the splice of his bat while he was trying to pull. Shehzad is under a skier at long-on and takes it quite well

good length ball on middle and off, Vettori slaps it to cover. Neesh was eager for a non-existent single and would have been out had Anwar Ali hit. Afridi throws himself at midwicket to ensure there are no overthrows and is mobbed by his team-mates!
slants a fuller delivery on middle and leg as the batsman was looking to give himself room to swing over the off side. Swing he does, but misses as Gul changes his pace
moves across to the off side this time to try and whip the ball to fine leg and allows a clear line of sight to the stumps for Gul, who says thank you very much
shortish and outside off, McCullum has carved it down to third man
dug in too short and it wanders away down leg as well. Easy call for the umpire
goes wide of the crease and bowls a touch shortish outside off, tapped away behind point
hammered, and it has enough power to beat a desperate dive from Shehzad at long-on. Neesham cleared that front leg and flat-batted it as hard as he possibly could

Nathan walks across to off stump and gets a full toss, swings it away to deep midwicket and gets a little greedy. There wasn't two there, but he tested his luck. Threw in a dive and everything, but Shehzad's throw is flat, hard, right beside the stumps and finds him short
fuller delivery outside off, Mills tonks it to mid-off

jumps outside leg and is duped by a slower ball quite wide of off stump. Neesham throws his bat at it and almost lobs up a return catch for Tanvir, but the bowler has lost sight of the ball in his followthrough
length ball outside off, carted away to long-off
finds the blockhole on middle and Neesham picks up a single towards mid-off
goes short and Mills has finished the innings off on a high with a pull to the square leg boundary. Think the slower bouncer went wrong there and Tanvir has a wry smile.
